name: Get an item with a Light Red rarity
Touch the left and right edges of the world
Fill the inventory of a Piggy Bank
Defeat King Slime using only Swords and/or Spears
Defeat King Slime using only a Flare Gun
Drown with a breathing reed in hand
Obtain 2 different Sentry Rods
Completely destroy a bee hive (including walls) without dying in the process
Fish up 2 unique crates
Obtain a Cooked Marshmallow
Defeat Eye of Cthulhu using only Swords and/or Spears
Place 4 regular bars (tiers 1-4) on top of each other on the dungeon
Craft Potions: Mining, Shine, Night Owl
Defeat a boss using only traps, boulders and/or NPCs
Cap spawns using beehives
Drain both oceans completely
Kill a Maggot Zombie, Ghost, and Raven
Pet the Town Dog
Have 100 Gel in your inventory
Submerge and stay in lava for 10 seconds
Gain access to a Shadow Orb or Demon Heart using Purification Powder
Wear a full set of Fossil armor
Fly a Kite during a windy day
Kill 2 monsters with a single rolling cactus
Trash a dungeon weapon
